original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, postHistory as ph, badges as b, votes as v, users as u WHERE u.Id =b.UserId AND b.UserId = ph.UserId AND ph.UserId = v.UserId AND v.UserId = c.UserId AND c.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-20 21:37:31' AS TIMESTAMP) AND ph.PostHistoryTypeId=12 AND u.UpVotes=0
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments WHERE comments.CreationDate >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-20 21:37:31'
CREATE VIEW E5 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE users.UpVotes = 0
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E5 AS SELECT * FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E5 WHERE E1.UserId=E5.Id)
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E5E4 AS SELECT * FROM E1E5 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E1E5.UserId=E4.UserId)
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E5E4E3 AS SELECT * FROM E1E5E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E1E5E4.UserId=E3.UserId)
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory WHERE postHistory.PostHistoryTypeId = 12
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E5E4E3E2 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1E5E4E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E1E5E4E3.UserId=E2.UserId)
